title: L'Oreal Paris Sublime Mousse by Healthy Look Hair Color, 90 Pure Light Blonde
description: Healthy Look gives you natural-looking color with glossy, healthy-looking shine in just 10 little minutes. The ammonia-free formula deeply nourishes hair while also helping to counter dullness and prevent damage.  The crème formula softly blends away grays, and won’t leave any visible roots. The conditioning treatment infused with Royal Jelly seals in glossy shine, leaving hair soft and silky.

title: OPI Nail Envy Original, 0.5 Ounce
description: You wouldn't face harsh elements without a coat, so why leave your nails unprotected Fortify, protect, and harden thin, brittle natural nails with the Original Nail Envy. For results, apply two coats, followed by a one-coat application every other day.

title: Neutrogena Microdermabrasion Holiday Bonus Pack
description: Neutrogena microdermabrasion system. Delivers visible results in just 1 use. Softer, more luminous skin. Firmer, younger looking skin.
